title: Flag of Romania
summary: The national flag of Romania (Romanian: drapelul Rom√¢niei) is a tricolor. The Constitution of Romania states that "The flag of Romania is tricolor; the colors are arranged vertically in the following order from the flagpole: blue, yellow, red".[1] The flag has a width-length ratio of 2:3; the proportions, shades of color as well as the flag protocol were established by law in 1994,[2] and extended in 2001.[3]
